name: Conveyance of Connection: Gensokyo Space Agency
name_original: Conveyance of Connection: Gensokyo Space Agency
description:
Scarlet Moon

Patchouli's laid-back rocket-building simulator

Lunarians open provisional trade and exchange with Gensokyo!

Taking advantage of this, the SDM launches the Gensokyo Space Agency!

Play as Patchouli, and design rockets. Mix and match different modules to suit the needs of your clients!

Send Sakuya out to search for new modules! Watch out for saboteurs!

9 modules to collect, 20 different missions to play! Replay value (and NG+)!

Control with a mouse.

You can find the music from the game here:

Soundcloud

YouTube

Credits:

Writing:  Nimrod, barukowo

Sprite Artwork: GiantCaveMushroom

Programming, Backgrounds, Music Arrangement: barukowo

Help: IceFairy
